page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: Most of the largest bedrooms are 15 metres square(approx). The average kitchen size is 14 metres square (approx) and the average sitting room is 25 metres square (approx). Nearly all houses have mains electricity and mains water but one or two do have their own spring water as well.A lot of changes have been made to quite a lot of the properties since they were built such as new porches and other extensions. All houses uses electricity for lighting but heating varies from oil fires to night storage heaters. Most houses are up to date with modern equipment such as freezers, colour televisions, telephones , radio, washing machines and record players.Some people are just getting the new machines like computers and microwaves.
